songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sapana ma ramne ma sapana ko vogi
Sapana liye hidne ma sapana lai boki
Tara sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sapana ma ramne ma sapana ko vogi

[Verse 1]
Kahile kahi daar pani lagchha
Man marchha jaba taba marna man lagchha
Kehi nahuda aafanta ni par vagchha
Tesaile garikhana ya kara pani lagchha
Ukalai bato hidchhu ma afnai paula dukhai
Mann daro parera afno ghaulai lukai
Euta thau ko bujhaile afno tauko dukhai
Hidchhu aasuko barsa ma aafu lai rujhai
Tara udhna chahanchuma khulla akashma
Charai tira chha ek thari ful ka basana
Tara ko chhana hoss sundar raatma
Mitho nindra pahad ko thula kakhma

[Chorus]
Tara Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Tara sapana sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sapana ma ramne ma sapana ko vogi
Sapana liye hidne ma sapana lai boki
Tara sabai sapana nai ho ki
Tara Sabai sapana nai ho ki

[Verse ]
Malai kehi pani thahchaina
Aate jey ni hunchha arey tara kehi ni vaachaina
Sachi je ni pugchha arey tara kehi ni paachaina
Manchhe jati tuchha teslai teti laaj lagdaina
Baato rokney dherai tara malai kehi ni baal chaina
Kehi hunna jaba samma kasaile ni aatdaina
Kasai ko ni saath chhaina
Ladchhu ma eklai
Aghi badchhu ma eklai
Sabai garchhu ma eklai
Mero kartut nai beglai
Farak hunchha dekhdai
Man marmat ma tyesai kaha man chuncha dekhdai
Ma hun sadak ko kavi
Ekdam alagai chhavi
Boli kadak chha ali
Tara man naramai chhani
Yestai ma mani
Yestai ho bhani
Sapana bunchhu tara huncha dherai ko kami
Attalinchu kahile kahi ma samaye dherai vo vani
Sapana mai jiuna sapana herdai chhu mani

[Chorus] x3
Tara Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sabai sapana nai ho ki
Tara sapana sabai sapana nai ho ki
Sapana ma ramne ma sapana ko vogi
Sapana liye hidne ma sapana lai boki
Tara sabai sapana nai ho ki
Tara Sabai sapana nai ho ki
songs.title: Sapana
